verbs.description: [ARG0: jcps] fires [V: ramsey] [ARG1: middle school assistant principal] [ARGM-TMP: following student injury investigation] the assistant principal at ramsey middle school has been fired by jcps following a district investigation into abuse and misconduct from when he was previously assigned to an alternative school middle school student wdrb media kennedy metro middle school jefferson county public schools kentucky kennedy metro ramsey middle school jennifer brislin kennedy metro middle joint center for political and economic studies louisville kentucky paul jarrell
